articles.title: Kim Jong Un Appreciates Concert Given by Military Band of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Appreciates Concert Given by Military Band of KPA 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, appreciated a concert given by the Military Band of the KPA .
					 After the national anthem was played, the audience observed a moment's silence in memory of general secretary Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence.
					
					 Its repertoire included band music "The General Is Always Alive as the Sun" and "The Song of the Korean People's Army" and band music and serial songs "Song of National Defence" and "Song of Coast Artillerymen".
					
					 The band vividly represented the militant spirit and invincible might of the heroic KPA with resounding sound and cheerful and appealing melodies.
					
					 Kim Jong Un praised the players for performing a militant concert dynamically arousing the army and the people of the DPRK to a revolutionary struggle by preserving well the characteristics peculiar to the military band.
					
					 He said with appreciation that the creators and players of the military band pooled their wisdom and efforts to thoroughly implement the instructions of Kim Jong Il in their creative activities, thereby achieving success in arranging every piece of music well, enhancing the level of depiction of conductors and bringing about innovations in rendition. 
					
					 He gave precious teachings which would serve as guidelines for performing activities of the KPA Military Band.
					
					 He called upon the creators and players of the Military Band to conduct more dynamic creative activities, not forgetting the true nature of the Military Band of the heroic Korean People' Army.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the creators and players of the KPA Military Band would as always perform louder and more dynamic militant songs powerfully arousing the service personnel and the people to accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of the WPK.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Pak To Chun, U Tong Chuk and other senior officials of the party, state and armed forces organs and KPA service personnel.

articles.title: Congratulations to Heads of State and Government of AU
articles.content:
Congratulations to Heads of State and Government of AU
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Jan 22 sent a congratulatory message to the 18th ordinary session of the assembly of heads of state and government of African Union due to open in Addis Ababa.
					 Kim in the message said AU's initiatives and efforts to solve the continent problems by itself free from any outside interference and to ensure regional peace, stability and socio-economic progress have elicited support and sympathy from the Koreans and other world progressives.
					
					 He reaffirmed the stand of the DPRK government to further expand and develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the African countries.
					
					 He sincerely hoped the AU session would offer a significant occasion in realizing the common desire of the member nations for peace, security and sustainable development of the African countries.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Makes Field Survey of Tideland Reclamation on Ryongmae Island
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Makes Field Survey of Tideland Reclamation on Ryongmae Island 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Thursday made field survey of Ryongmae Island under tideland reclamation.
					 The island area is undergoing change day by day thanks to the devoted efforts of the tideland builders, who have sped up the reclamation in the spirit of South Hamgyong Province from the beginning of the year in order to carry out the militant tasks laid in the decision of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the joint New Year editorial.
					
					 Touring different parts of the tideland being successfully reclaimed at the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, the premier learned in detail about the progress of the project and the matters arising in hastening its schedule.
					
					 Under the condition that dyke is wave-beaten by high tide, the officials and builders should conduct the project without letup through scrupulous organization and command over transport and effective use of vehicles, the premier stressed.
					
					 He called upon them to work miracles and feats in the gigantic project to widen the lands of the country, true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and thus translate Kim Jong Il's desire for building a thriving nation into a brilliant reality.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun U.S. Warmongers' Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun U.S. Warmongers' Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. secretary of Defense, the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff and the commander-in-chief of the U.S. Armed Forces in the Pacific noted with "concern" that there is a big "threat of uncertainty" despite the sign of such fresh opportunity as "wind of democracy" in the DPRK. They also talked about vigilance being heightened against the "worst scenario."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined commentary terms this sheer sophism and a lie to divert elsewhere the public opinion.
					
					 The United States is too much ignorant of its rival.
					
					 It is foolish for it to hope for any "change" from the DPRK. The U.S. military bosses' absurd remarks are a deliberate provocation rather than an expression of their ignorance of the politics of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to make the "threat" from the DPRK an established fact at any cost in a bid to justify its anti-DPRK moves and attain its sinister aim.
					
					 It is its invariable ambition and strategy to dominate the world by force of arms. It considers it can take control of the world only when it holds supremacy over Asia Pacific with main emphasis put on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. design is to contain and pressurize big powers by holding military supremacy in Asia Pacific, and stifle its "rivals" through collective military actions.
					
					 Its provocation against the DPRK is no more than a shameless and mean trick to cover up its nature as a wrecker of regional peace and stability and shift the blame onto the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces had better clearly understand the reality and stop uttering nonsense.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits at Planned U.S.-S. Korea War Gamble
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits at Planned U.S.-S. Korea War Gamble
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers decided to stage the anti-DPRK joint military exercises, Key Resolve, across south Korea from the latter part of February despite the strong protest at home and abroad. 
					 This is an unpardonable grave military provocation to the sovereignty of the DPRK and a wanton challenge to the international community's desire for peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The Key Resolve is a nuclear war rehearsal for aggression on the DPRK aimed to occupy the whole of the Korean Peninsula by force of arms. 
					
					 Huge armed forces of the U.S. and south Korea will be hurled into the exercises and means for preemptive nuclear attack and naval operation groups deployed in south Korea and its surrounding waters. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the exercises will deteriorate the critical inter-Korean relations and drive the tension of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war. 
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet warmongers have asserted that the rehearsal does not pose threat to anyone as it is "annual and defensive one."
					
					 But, such assertion is a foolish trick to cover up its aggressive and provocative nature and evade the accusation against them as mastermind in disturbing the peace and stability of the peninsula. 
					
					 More intolerable is the fact the rehearsal is to be staged when the people of the DPRK are still mourning over the great loss to the nation. Herein lies its gangster-like nature. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will mercilessly punish those gangsters who rush into a house of mourning with flaming torch of aggression.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Authorities' "Unification Education"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Authorities' "Unification Education"
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is reportedly mulling establishing the "highest course of unification policy" from February, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The content of the education include the "government's unification policy toward the north", "diplomatic efforts for solving the north's nuclear issue" and "the north's reality and prospect for change".
					
					 This is a grave insult to and mockery of the Korean people's unanimous desire for independence and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Traitor Lee is an anti-reunification element who hampered the efforts to implement the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone for reunification, and the October 4 declaration, its practical programme. He also brought the favorably developing north-south relations to a total collapse. This worst immoral man hurt the people in the north when they were grieving over the great loss to the nation.
					
					 It is a height of impudence for the group of traitors to talk about "unification".
					
					 The "unification education" asserted by the group is aimed to incite the atmosphere of escalating extreme confrontation with the DPRK in the south Korean society and massively bring up anti-reunification maniacs.
					
					 Anti-reunification elements including the minister of Unification and the minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade are supposed to tutor the supporters of the Lee regime including senior military officers.
					
					 Lee has neither idea nor policy that put in place regarding reunification.
					
					 It is comedy for such a political imbecile to talk about the "unification policy and education".
					
					 The group's "education of unification policy" is nothing but a foolish attempt to swallow up the DPRK pursuant to its anti-reunification policy. 
					
					 This is, however, nothing but a daydream.
					
					 The Korean People's Army and the people are scoffing at the group of traitors who dream of the "unification of system" while anticipating the "contingency" in the DPRK that has never existed nor can ever happen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Barrier to National Reunification Should Be Removed
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Barrier to National Reunification Should Be Removed
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- For the Korean nation's ardent desire for reunification to be realized, it is urgent to wage the struggle for ousting the south Korean conservative group of traitors keen in north-south confrontation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It is the demand of the times and the nation to sweep away the group of outrageous traitors hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, which committed the unpardonable hideous crimes during the mourning over the great loss to the nation, is employing a sleight of hand to cover up its treacherous nature while again talking about "flexibility" and "channel for dialogue" when it faced a strong protest of the public at home and abroad.
					
					 It is the fixed stand and will of the DPRK to pave a wide avenue for peace, reunification and prosperity of the nation by the concerted efforts of all Koreans on the basis of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The independent reunification, peace and prosperity we mean are the cause to be accomplished by joining hands with all patriotic forces loving the country and the nation. This cause has nothing to do with such traitors as the Lee Myung Bak group. Only ruin is waiting for this group.
					
					 The north-south relations, on which the prospect of the nation's destiny and reunification hinge, can by no means be a plaything of the south Korean ruling quarters.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations Leave
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations Leave 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Leaving here on Saturday were a delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea led by Vice-Chairwoman of its Central Committee Chae Chun Hui to attend the session of the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation in Lisbon of Portugal and a delegation of the Ministry of Fisheries headed by Minister Pak Thae Won to visit Russia.

articles.title: Japan-resident Korean Schoolchildren Take Part in New Year Performance
articles.content:
Japan-resident Korean Schoolchildren Take Part in New Year Performance
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Japan-resident Korean schoolchildren enjoy acclamations at the lunar New Year performance, which is going on at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace in Pyongyang.
					 They put on the stage a narration and dance "We Will Always Follow the Sun."
					
					 The audience is deeply moved by the performers wailing over the demise of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 "We will never forget General Kim Jong Il, who had remitted educational aid fund and stipends to us every year, as well as condolatory fund, in order to defend us," they narrate with tears running down their cheeks.
					
					 They also say, "We will always follow the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of General Kim Jong Il."
					
					 Kim Ri Yong, a student at Tokyo Korean Primary and Secondary School No. 1, told KCNA that she could hardly hold back tears at the performance, with ardent yearning for the leader. 
					
					 Kim Sung Myong, a student at Tokyo Korean Primary and Secondary School No. 5, said, "I feel a pride in joining children of the homeland at the New Year performance."
					
					 An estimated 100 children selected from all Korean schools throughout Japan are taking part at the performance.

articles.title: Skating Competition for Jongilbong Prize Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Skating Competition for Jongilbong Prize Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The skating competition of the 38th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize took place here from Jan. 23 to 27. 
					 Taking part in the competition, divided into secondary and primary schoolers' groups were more than 200 schoolchildren selected from different parts of the country. 
					
					 Boys of Jangjin Secondary School in Jangjin County and girls of Sohung Secondary School in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, took the first place in the secondary schoolers' group.
					
					 Boys of Kilju Primary School in Kilju County, North Hamgyong Province, and girls of Hungdok Primary School in Hamhung City placed first in the primary schoolers' group.

articles.title: Singer Remaining in Memory of Korean People
articles.content:
Singer Remaining in Memory of Korean People 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- After enjoying a music and dance performance "Let Us Uphold Our Supreme Commander Forever" at the April 25 House of Culture in Pyongyang some time ago, the dear respected Kim Jong Un recollected Im Tok Su, 67, who was a singer of the State Merited Chorus.
					 Kim Jong Un said he felt sorry that Im died in harness after singing revolutionary songs for decades.
					
					 Born as a son of a mine worker, Im enlisted in the Korean People's Army in Juche 52 (1963). 
					
					 During his military service, he took part in servicepersons' art festival.
					
					 After joining the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble in 1971, he played the part of a botanist in the revolutionary opera "The Story of a Nurse", a winner of the People's Prize.
					
					 Under the guidance of Kim Jong Il, he successfully performed his part as a veteran member of the Workers' Party of Korea in the opera.
					
					 In December that year the song and dance ensemble performed the opera in honor of President Kim Il Sung. After the performance general secretary Kim Jong Il highly appreciated Im's acting, saying the actor in his twenties performed well just like an old botanist. 
					
					 Since then, he took part in some 1 000 performances of the opera.
					
					 Afterwards, Im took the part of the hero in another revolutionary opera "Under the Bright Sun".
					
					 After enjoying the opera, Kim Jong Il introduced Im to the President, saying he performed a feat as a botanist in the opera "The Story of a Nurse".
					
					 Im was honored with the title of Merited Artiste in September 1978.
					
					 He visited many army units and industrial establishments to sing solo or in chorus. He also made performance tours of some Asian and European nations.
					
					 He was active as deputy head of the song and dance ensemble and a section chief of the State Merited Chorus, training a lot of singers.
					
					 He, honored again with the title of People's Artiste, took part in more than 100 performances of the State Merited Chorus from the first one in December 1995.
					
					 He died of a sudden illness in December 30 last year while energetically conducting artistic activities for inspiring with strength and courage the Korean servicepersons and civilians who were overwhelmed with grief at the demise of general secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Though he passed away, he still remains in the memory of the Korean people.

articles.title: Songun Politics Guarantees Victorious Advance of Socialism
articles.content:
Songun Politics Guarantees Victorious Advance of Socialism
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- January 29 marks the 9th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-victorious Banner of Our Revolution." 
					 The work comprehensively clarifies the idea and theory of Songun (military-first) politics greatly significant in accomplishing the cause of Juche-based socialism and the cause of human independence. 
					
					 In the work, the leader expounded the essence, nature and great vitality of the Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea. He also gave tasks to put the Juche-based revolutionary cause on a new stage under the Songun leadership. 
					
					 He said the Songun politics, based on President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the military affairs, fully reflects the requirements of the times and developing revolution. He also said the politics is a socialist political mode based on a proper settlement of the issue of the driving force of revolution and dignified Juche-oriented politics.  
					
					 The long history of the Korean revolution includes two revolutionary wars against powerful imperialists, two-stage social revolution and the struggle for protecting the socialist nation's dignity and sovereignty from the imperialists' moves to stifle it.  
					
					 The DPRK has always emerged victorious because it has adhered to the principle of Songun. 
					
					 Experience gained from practice goes to prove that the Songun politics provides definite guarantee for a victorious advance of the socialist cause. 
					
					 The work inspires the Korean people with a strong will to remain faithful to the Songun-based revolution guided by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Field Medical Service Teams Active in DPRK
articles.content:
Field Medical Service Teams Active in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Medical workers are active in providing field services in the DPRK.
					 The Ministry of Public Health dispatched many field service teams made up of competent doctors, nurses and prosthetists to major socialist construction sites.
					
					 Measures were also taken to provide the teams with sufficient medicines and medical apparatuses.
					
					 The team of the Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University made sincere examination and treatment of workers of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex.
					
					 Doctors and nurses of the Kim Man Yu Hospital, Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Ministry of Public Health General Dental Hospital and the Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital have been posted to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, East Pyongyang Thermal Plant, Hana Music Information Center and other units. They are providing not only medical check-ups but necessary measures.
					
					 Those hospitals engaged in mobile field services outside Pyongyang include the Jagang Provincial People's Hospital, Kangwon Provincial People's Hospital, North Phyongan Provincial Maternity Hospital and the Hamhung Orthopedic Hospital.
					
					 Medical workers of the South Hwanghae Provincial People's Hospital toured more than 20 farms to take preventive and curative medical care for farmers while helping their work.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Thailand,Sweden
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Thailand,Sweden
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Thai preparatory committee and the Swedish joint preparatory committee for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il were inaugurated on Jan. 20 and 21.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the Thai preparatory committee and Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, chairman of the Swedish joint preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremonies.
					
					 The preparatory committees decided to publish Kim Jong Il's work, post on Internet commemorative articles and organize colorful events.

articles.title: Nigerian Media on S. Koreans' Reverence for Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Nigerian Media on S. Koreans' Reverence for Kim Jong Un 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Media of Nigeria introduced the south Korean people's ardent reverence for the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The Nigerian Observer on Jan. 9 carried an article under the title of "Supreme leader of the DPRK" and the subtitle of "Trust and social interest in leader Kim Jong Un rapidly growing in south Korea".
					
					 South Korean media are extensively reporting about the greatness of Kim Jong Un, the paper noted, saying:
					
					 Progressive Internet papers including Jaju Minbo, Thongil News and Surprise reported; General Kim Jong Un clarified from a fresh angle and in a unique way the geopolitical position of the Korean Peninsula in his early days. In actuality the relations of forces around the peninsula are now being reorganized centering on the DPRK as he predicted. Noticeable is 2012 when his leadership ability will be displayed.
					
					 The Internet homepage of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 12 carried the following article:
					
					 South Korean media continue to carry articles praising the great personality of leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Internet homepage Solidarity for Hope said; It is reported that General Kim Jong Un, known as incarnation of human love, has enjoyed respect and love from many revolutionary forerunners and comrades for his kindness and attraction. This just shows that he is the center of leadership and unity in the wake of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Internet paper Surprise said; "Our nation is proud as it has President Kim Il Sung, Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and General Kim Jong Un. Our nation will surely enjoy a happy life in reunified country as it has had the sagacious leaders generation after generation."
					
					 Magazine Sisa Journal reported that General Kim Jong Un was singled out to be the first of famous persons in 2010, as the symbolic person to control the tension in the Korean Peninsula."
					
					 Media gave wide publicity to the fact that the U.S. and other Western countries' media have praised Kim Jong Un as General of Korea who was singled out to be the person drawing the greatest interest of the world.
					
					 South Korean citizens have said that General Kim Jong Un's is the idea of general offensive and his political method is the way of all-out attack and that he is displaying the distinguished political ability to have the situation in Northeast Asia and the Korean Peninsula under his thumb.
					
					 They laud leader Kim Jong Un's matchless grit and pluck, outstanding military insight and commanding art.
					
					 People of different strata in south Korea said; Personally directing the military parade to celebrate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea, General Kim Jong Un exhibited with blitz not only intercontinental ballistic missiles but also interceptor missile system beyond anticipation, thus displaying the tremendous defence capabilities and stunning world military experts.
					
					 Experts, too, said; General Kim Jong Un in the north uses freely the highly planned political and military strategies. In a word the intention of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and General Kim Jong Un is to finally settle the DPRK-U.S. relations and build a great prosperous and powerful country.
					
					 Even high-ranking officials and conservative media of south Korea are showing their anxiety and impatience at the grit and pluck of leader Kim Jong Un and the military might of the Korean People's Army commanded by him.

articles.title: U.S. Organization Flails S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK War Moves
articles.content:
U.S. Organization Flails S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK War Moves
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The North American Group for Study of the Juche and Songun Idea in the United States issued a statement on Jan. 11 denouncing the south Korean authorities for their moves for a war against the DPRK.
					 Extending solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle against the imperialist moves for aggression, the statement said:
					
					 We express firm support with the DPRK government and people at the present dangerous time when the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea is becoming evermore pronounced in its moves to ignite a war against the DPRK again.
					
					 The past several weeks clearly showed whoever truly wants peace or whoever is opposed to it.
					
					 The whole world mourned the demise of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il with bitter grief but the U.S., Japan and south Korea only committed anti-DPRK, treacherous acts.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group disallowed the south Korean people to express condolences over the demise of the father of the nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should ponder over the grave consequences to be entailed by their reckless war moves.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to work for Korea's reunification in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Iran Accuses West's Sanctions
articles.content:
Iran Accuses West's Sanctions
 Tehran, January 27 (KCNA) -- The deputy foreign minister of Iran in an interview with a news agency on Jan. 23 scathingly accused the West of its unreasonable sanctions against his country.
					 "Unfortunately, certain governments see the sanctions on oil and banking as a breakthrough for the dispute on nuclear program, whereas, the sanctions will drive their own crippling economies to further complications," he noted.
					
					 He said that the EU new sanctions will bring nothing to them and they must adopt constructive approach towards the Islamic Republic of Iran to settle the dispute.

articles.title: Palestinian UN Envoy Says Israeli Settlement Activities Increased by 20 Percent in 2011
articles.content:
Palestinian UN Envoy Says Israeli Settlement Activities Increased by 20 Percent in 2011
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A top Palestinian official on Tuesday said that Israeli settlement activities increased by at least 20 percent in 2011, and actually "exceeded all past years of settlement activity" in the occupied Palestinian territory.
					 Riyad Mansour, the permanent observer of Palestine to the UN, made the statement to the Security Council in an open debate on the Middle East.
					
					 "In fact, Israeli settlement activities increased by at least 20 percent in the past year, with construction initiated on 1,850 units and at least 3,500 units under construction in 2011 in 142 illegal settlements and so-called 'outposts' in the West Bank," Mansour said.
					
					 He said the settlement drive has been "most fierce" in and around East Jerusalem, including in the Jordan Valley deep inside the territory and other areas referred to as "Area C."

articles.title: Iran Slams EU Oil Embargo, Warns Could Hit U.S.
articles.content:
Iran Slams EU Oil Embargo, Warns Could Hit U.S.
 Tehran, January 27 (KCNA) -- Iran accused Europeans on Monday of waging "psychological warfare" after the EU banned imports of Iranian oil.
					 "If any disruption happens regarding the sale of Iranian oil, the Strait of Hormuz will definitely be closed," Mohammad Kossari, deputy head of parliament's foreign affairs and national security committee, told Fars news agency a day after U.S., French and British warships sailed back into the Gulf.
					
					 "If America seeks adventures after the closure of the Strait of Hormuz, Iran will make the world unsafe for Americans in the shortest possible time," Kossari added, referring to an earlier U.S. pledge to use its fleet to keep the passage open.

articles.title: 4 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
articles.content:
4 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan have killed Pakistanis under the signboard of "anti-terrorism".
					 At least four people were killed in two U.S. drone strikes on Monday morning in North Waziristan tribal region in northwestern Pakistan.

articles.title: Swedish FM Urges Stepped up EU Diplomacy on Iran Nuclear Deadlock
articles.content:
Swedish FM Urges Stepped up EU Diplomacy on Iran Nuclear Deadlock 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Swedish Foreign Minister Carl Bildt on Monday called on the European Union to step up diplomatic efforts to resolve the stalemate over Iran's nuclear program.
					 "No one has an interest ... in confrontation or war," he added.
					
					 He warned sanctions alone are not the answer to this issue.
					
					 Sweden's top diplomat has repeatedly made clear that a negotiated settlement was the only way to settle the Iranian nuclear deadlock.

articles.title: Japan's Trade Deficit
articles.content:
Japan's Trade Deficit 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Japan marked 2.49 trillion yen in trade deficit in 2011, according to a preliminary report by the Finance Ministry Wednesday.

articles.title: Economic Depression in U.S.
articles.content:
Economic Depression in U.S. 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The National Association of Realtors (NAR) said on Jan. 25 that its index of pending home sales declined 3.5 percent to 96.6 in December from 100.1 in November.
					 Meanwhile, U.S. telecommunications company Motorola Solutions announced Wednesday that 2011 fourth quarter net earnings were down 108 million U.S. dollars compared to a year ago.

articles.title: U.S. and West's Anti-Iran Moves Rebuffed Worldwide
articles.content:
U.S. and West's Anti-Iran Moves Rebuffed Worldwide
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the West work hard to block Iran's independent nuclear activities by applying economic sanctions on one hand and posing military threats on the other. These illegal actions have triggered bitterer protest and denunciation worldwide.
					 A spokesperson of the Chinese Foreign Ministry voiced strong opposition to the U.S. which unilaterally internationalized the application of sanctions on Iran and imposed sanctions on Chinese companies in compliance with the U.S. law.
					
					 A vice-minister of the Russian Foreign Ministry said the international community would regard the threat of military offensive and sanctions on Iran as an attempt to realize a "regime change" in the country. The military operations against Iran would be the West's most serious fiasco, he added.
					
					 The Foreign Ministry of Singapore in a statement clarified that its government has no willingness to abide by other countries' laws.  
					
					A secretary of the Foreign Ministry of India stressed his government stand not to follow the U.S. step of sanctions but to keep purchasing oil from Iran.
					
					 The Ukrainian foreign minister insisted the military conflict between Iran and the West would entail skyrocketing oil price in the world and plunge it into a holocaust. He called for a peaceful solution to Iran's nuclear issue.
					
					 Japan and European countries that voiced support for the U.S. sanctions are locked in fierce controversy.
					
					 Japan's media reported that with the situation in Iran getting tense, oil price rose beyond 100 dollars per bb1. A sharp oil price hike is likely to give a serious blow to Japan's economy, it deplored. 
					
					 Debt-laden Italy, Greece and other European countries which live on Iranian oil have run into trouble.
					
					 EU announced a decision on the phased ban on oil import from Iran and is busy allowing some member nations more time before the ban goes into effect, addressing their complaints and relieving them of their worries.
					
					 The U.S. is also fidgety about the matter.
					
					 A recent analysis data said if Iran blocks off the Strait of Hormuz for 30 days, the U.S. will suffer financial loss of about 75 billion U.S. dollars.
					
					 Analysts comment that the U.S. and the West are caught in their own snare and put in a dilemma over Iran's issue.

articles.title: Venezuela Invariably Advances for Socialism
articles.content:
Venezuela Invariably Advances for Socialism 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan government and people are vigorously advancing along the way of independence, working hard to lay firm foundation for socialist construction. 
					 As known, the Venezuelan government decided in February 2009 to drastically amend the constitution in the interests of the country and the nation and as required by the era so as to provide the solid political and legal foundations for socialist development. 
					
					 Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez Frias said capitalism brought misfortunes only to the overwhelming majority of the popular masses and that the only way for the Venezuelan people is socialism. The government would replace the outdated capitalist state system with a new system serving the popular masses and make positive efforts to develop the nation's economy through complete nationalization, he stressed. 
					
					 The government has taken national measures for interests of the country and people to build up material foundations for socialist construction. 
					
					 Early in 2007 the government made public the plan for nationalization of industries. 
					
					 It lowered the poverty rate by 21.6 percent in the first half of last year and mulls reducing the number of the poor to 2.5 million.
					
					 It is putting efforts to increasing national defence in order to provide military guarantee for the successful socialist construction. 
					
					 It adopted a decision on establishing strong anti-air system, taking steps to intensify the air force and double tank and artillery units. 
					
					 The struggle of the government and people of Venezuela will surely achieve excellent results as they vigorously advance along the way of socialism and independence, believing in their own strength.

articles.title: Ahmadinejad: Iran Will Respond to Any Threat
articles.content:
Ahmadinejad: Iran Will Respond to Any Threat 
 Tehran, January 27 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad in a recent interview with a TV declared that Iran will strongly respond to any threat of the enemies against it.
					 He said that the U.S. and its allies are trying to prevent Iranian progress, because they intend to dominate Middle East completely and stabilize the Zionist regime and they consider Iran as an obstacle on this way. 
					
					 He said sanctions have no effect on Iranian progress. 
					
					 He stressed that history has shown that any foreign power that wanted to invade Iran has failed and regretted his action.

articles.title: Putin Charges U.S. with Its Ambition to Dominate World
articles.content:
Putin Charges U.S. with Its Ambition to Dominate World
 Moscow, January 27 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin recently said the United States uses its opposition to other countries' internal and external affairs which are regarded as legitimate to them as a means for realizing its ambition to dominate the world.
					 The United States has no willing to equitably cooperate with any other countries and what it wants is not allies but colonies, he said, adding that it is going to control everything.

articles.title: Pakistan Rejects U.S. Report on NATO Attack
articles.content:
Pakistan Rejects U.S. Report on NATO Attack
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Pakistan's military Monday rejected U.S. findings on a November 26 NATO cross-border air attack that killed 24 Pakistani soldiers.
					 "Pakistan does not agree with several portions and findings of the investigation report, as these are factually not correct," the military said in a statement after a detailed review of the U.S. investigation.
					
					 The U.S. report released on December 22 found both American and Pakistani forces were to blame for the incident near the Afghan border, inflaming already strained ties.
					
					 "Affixing partial responsibility of the incident on Pakistan is therefore unjustified and unacceptable," said the Pakistani military.

articles.title: Russia to Develop National Defense Capabilities
articles.content:
Russia to Develop National Defense Capabilities
 Moscow, January 27 (KCNA) -- Russia is paying deep attention to continuous development of the national defense capabilities.
					 This year the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation are to be provided with the surface-to-air missiles complex "S-400" for a division under the orders for national defense.
					
					 Also a contract was made to produce 28 fighters, 55 combat training crafts and 120 helicopters of various kinds.
					
					 The first deputy minister of Defense said this on Jan. 24.

articles.title: Bribery of Aide to Lee Myung Bak Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bribery of Aide to Lee Myung Bak Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- One more scandal of an aide to traitor Lee Myung Bak has been disclosed in south Korea, evoking public criticism.
					 The man at issue is Yun Jin Sik, a lawmaker from the "Grand National Party" who was once senior presidential secretary for economic affairs at Chongwadae. He received illegal political fund from Yu Tong Chon, president of the Jeil Saving Bank.
					
					 Yu testified to the fact that he gave this money to Yun at the time of the parliamentary by-elections in July 2010.
					
					 This being a hard fact, Yun has denied his sin while the prosecution has downplayed its investigation into the case, asserting that it is hard to prosecute Yun on charges of bribery.
					
					 Criticizing this action, the opposition Democratic United Party warned that the people would never pardon the prosecution if it covers up such illegality for the mere reason that he is just an aide to the chief executive.

articles.title: U.S. Has No Right to Talk about Human Rights: American Professor
articles.content:
U.S. Has No Right to Talk about Human Rights: American Professor
						
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A professor of George Washington University of the U.S. charged that the U.S. has gone beyond the limit line in human rights abuses, according to south Korean Internet paper "Chamsesang" on Jan. 25.
					 The professor interpreted its reasons in 10 different ways in an article contributed to the Washington Post on Jan. 14.
					
					 The article disclosed that the present president is empowered to give an order of shooting to death any moment and detain any citizen for an indefinite period without going through elementary legal procedures.
					
					 It is the U.S. where citizens are not granted freedom of legal suit, the article said, adding that the water-boarding by the U.S. army has already been known to the world.
					
					 The whole world has demanded punishment of its assailants, but the present U.S. government denied any investigation into the case or an act of filing a law suit, the article pointed out, saying this is a stark violation of the international law.
					
					 The professor stressed that the U.S. has no right to call for other countries' improvement of human rights in a report on human rights situation it has announced every year, styling itself "guardian of liberal democracy".

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Punishment of Traitor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Punishment of Traitor Lee Myung Bak 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Jan. 21 in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' vicious anti-DPRK moves.
					 Traitor Lee said the "door to an opportunity" is opened and "it is necessary to remove bilateral mistrust" while visiting other countries to "win their joint efforts for ensuring stability and peace" on the Korean Peninsula from the outset of the year. 
					
					 His remarks tell as if he is interested in improvement of the inter-Korean relations and dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 Referring to this fact, the statement said that the Lee group orchestrated the provocative warship sinking and Yonphyong Island shelling incidents to bring the north-south relations to collapse.
					
					 The group committed high treason by rubbing salt into the wounds of fellow countrymen in bitter grief at the untimely passing of the father of the nation and insulting the dignity of the DPRK and disallowing condolatory visits to Pyongyang by south Koreans of different social strata, it pointed out.
					
					 On the contrary to its calling for "dialogue", the group has massively introduced nuclear war weaponry from the U.S. and ceaselessly staged anti-DPRK war drills aimed in collusion with outside forces, the statement said, adding this fully reveals its foul double-dealing nature.
					
					 The statement further said:
					
					 With surging indignation of the nation, the General Association and all Korean residents in China bitterly condemn the reckless moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors misleading the public opinion at home and abroad to persist on its policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The group must apologize to the entire nation for the high treason committed during the mourning over the great loss to the nation before calling for "dialogue" with reluctance.
					
					 All Koreans should continue to the last the struggle to drive out the group from the arena of history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia competencias modelo del club de aeronautica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia competencias modelo del club de aeronautica
 Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, presencio las competencias modelo de los jugadores del club de aeronautica de la zona occidental. 
					 Al ver una demostracion de vuelos de planeadores teledirigidos, aprecio mucho a los jugadores del club que mostraron bien sus habilidades de aeronautica adquiridas en los ejecicios rutinarios. 
					
					 Esta modalidad requiere de ricos conocimientos de ingenieria y altas tecnologias, dijo y resalto la necesidad de organizar ampliamente la competencia de planeador que da a los espectadores abundantes conocimientos, gran pasion y fuerte aspiracion a alcanzar lo mas alto. 
					
					 Luego, el Comandante Supremo vio la competencia modelo de paracaidistas. 
					
					 Observo con mucha atencion si aterrizan exactamente en los puntos predefinidos los jugadores participantes en la competencia de descenso colectivo y felicito con aplausos el exito de ellos cada vez que se marcaban buenas notas en la pizarra electronica de arbitraje. 
					
					 Se puso regocijado cuando vio a los participantes en el paracaidismo acrobatico colectivo que descendian cerrando en breve una formacion pese a las dificiles condiciones. 
					
					 La competencia de planeador y el paracaidismo se divulgan ampliamente en el mundo junto con el desarrollo vertiginoso de la aeronautica, dijo.
					
					 Prosiguio que deben desarrollar los deportes aereos a la altura de la era del Songun para que los jugadores glorifiquen con las medallas de oro el honor y la dignidad de la patria en los juegos internacionales y preparar fisicamente a los jovenes, ninos escolares y trabajadores para el trabajo y la defensa nacional. 
					
					 Terminado el paracaidismo modelo, el Comandante Supremo se reunio con los jugadores, volvio a elogiarlos y se retrato con ellos. 
					
					 Al informarse de que en el club hay matrimonios de paracaidistas, llamo a su lado a las parejas Jon Chol Gu-Kim Song Sim y Kim Hyong Jun-Kang Hye Sim y volvio a fotografiarse con estos. 
					
					 Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los entrenadores y jugadores de deportes aereos, inclusive los del citado club, haran gran aporte al desarrollo de esta rama del pais. 
					
					 El Comandante Supremo fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong y Pak Jae Gyong, generales de ejercito del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de vuelo de la Unidad 378 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de vuelo de la Unidad 378 del EPC
 Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, dirigio un entrenamiento de vuelo de la Unidad 378 de las Fuerzas Aereas del EPC con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup. 
					 Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, el Comandante Supremo se entero del cumplimiento de la mision de guardia por la unidad y dirigio un entrenamiento de pilotos. 
					
					 Elogio a los aviadores mirando sonriente el aspecto valiente de ellos que navegaban en el cielo manejando sus aeroplanos con coraje e intrepidez.
					
					 Felicito a los pilotos por el exitoso entrenamiento mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos se hayan preparado como competentes timoneles de cazas, al practicar el pilotaje en el maximo estado de movilizacion teniendo presente que el ejercicio es precisamente el combate.
					
					 Gracias a que los fidedignos y orgullosos pilotos defienden el espacio aereo jurisdiccional de la patria, ningun enemigo se atreve a atentar contra la Corea del Songun, nuestra patria brilla como inexpugnable fortaleza socialista y su cielo sera siempre sereno, dijo. 
					
					 Acto seguido, recorrio el dormitorio, el comedor y las salas de leccion para los pilotos de una subunidad adscrita a dicha unidad. 
					
					 Las estrellas en las hombreras de comandantes no son simbolo de buen tratamiento sino la senal de confianza en su responsabilidad asumida ante la patria y la revolucion, senalo y subrayo encarecidamente que si ellos no conocen el peso de sus estrellas, no tienen derecho a hablar de su calificacion de comandante.
					
					 Destaco que aunque tropiecen con dificultades en completar los preparativos de combate y resolver los problemas surgidos en la vida de uniformados, los comandantes deben trabajar infatigablemente pensando en la confianza especial del partido depositada en las estrellas de su hombrera.
					
					 Presento a los comandantes acompanantes y los integrantes del mando de las operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC las tareas para acabar los preparativos de combate en el ejercito.
					
					 Tomo una fotografia de recuerdo con los militares de la unidad y estrecho la mano con los comandantes diciendoles que realizaran mejor los ejercicios manteniendose saludables.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, los generales de ejercito Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong y Pak Jae Gyong, y los miembros del mando de las operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda eliminar obstaculos de reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda eliminar obstaculos de reunificacion
 Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que para realizar el anhelo fervoroso de la nacion coreana es necesario desplegar la lucha por aniquilar a la banda conservadora surcoreana enriquecida en la confrontacion fratricida.
					 Arrasar a la banda traidora de la nacion que recurre freneticamente a la confrontacion fratricida es la demanda de la epoca y la nacion, comienza el articulo y continua:
					
					 La banda de Lee Myung Bak, por sus tremendos crimenes inmorales durante el gran duelo nacional, recibio la fuerte protesta y denuncia del interior y exterior del pais. Entonces para ocultar su naturaleza antinacional dice de la "flexibilidad" y el "establecimiento de la ruta de dialogo".
					
					 Abrir el camino ancho por la paz, la reunificacion y la prosperidad nacional con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion coreana a base de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre es la invariable posicion y la voluntad de Corea.
					
					 La reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad que desea la RPDC son la causa a ser lograda con las fuerzas patrioticas que aman al pais y la nacion. Pero, esta causa no tiene que ver con la banda traidora como la de Lee. A ella le caera solo la derrota.
					
					 Las relaciones intercoreanas de que dependen el destino de la nacion y la perspectiva de la reunificacion no pueden ser victima de engano de la banda traidora surcoreana.

articles.title: ACNC comenta esencia de "educacion de reunificacion" en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta esencia de "educacion de reunificacion" en el Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con Yonhap News, la banda de Lee Myung Bak abrira desde febrero que viene el llamado "curso de maximo nivel de la politica de reunificacion", en que se impartira la educacion en la "politica del gobierno sobre la reunificacion con el Norte", los "esfuerzos diplomaticos por la solucion del problema nuclear del Norte", la "situacion real y las perspectivas de cambio en el Norte", etc. 
					 La inauguracion de ese curso es un grave insulto y burla a la unanime aspiracion de la nacion coreana a la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais. 
					
					 El traidor Lee Myung Bak es un opositor a la reunificacion que impidio la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, jalon de reunificacion, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementacion de la primera, y llevo a la ruptura total las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas que se desarrollaban favorablemente. 
					
					 Ademas, al cometer tremendos crimenes inmorales, ese tipejo degenerado hizo sufrir mas dolor a los connacionales del Norte ya heridos de gravedad por el gran duelo nacional. 
					
					 La "educacion de la reunificacion", de que hablan los compinches del traidor Lee, es la mas reaccionaria encaminada a fomentar el extremado clima de confrontacion anti-RPDC y formar a muchos maniacos anti-reunificacion. 
					
					 Los lectores del curso mencionado son connotados elementos anti-reunificacion como los ministros de Reunificacion y de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio. Y los educandos tambien son los partidarios del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak como cabecillas del circulo militar. 
					
					 El traidor Lee no tiene desde el principio ningun ideal ni la politica sobre la reunificacion. 
					
					 El nuevo curso de los traidores surcoreanos no persigue otro objetivo que tomar a la RPDC en virtud de su politica anti-reunificacion, lo cual no sucedera nunca.
					
					 El ejercito y pueblo coreanos se burlan de la camarilla surcoreana que suena con la "reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" esperando la "situacion de emergencia" que no hubo ni acontecera en la RPDC.
